metadata.name: Golden Token: City 6 1/999
metadata.description:
**[CryptoCitizens](https://opensea.io/collection/cryptocitizensofficial) | [Roadmap](https://www.brightmoments.io/) | [Discord](https://discord.gg/brightmoments)**

A Golden Token City 6 (GTC6) NFT provides the holder with a claim to mint 1 of 1,000 City 6 CryptoCitizen NFTs through an IRL-only mint experience. City 6 be in Central America (i.e Mexico City, Panama, or Costa Rica) in Fall 2022 and voted on by CryptoCitizen holders in Summer 2022.
